CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( Maintenance_Amount__c>0, ISPICKVAL(Type,"ACV Recovery/Partial ACV Reinstatement") ), "Recovery",
IF( ISBLANK(Maintenance_Amount__c), "",
IF( AND( OR( Maintenance_Amount__c = 0, Maintenance_Amount__c<0 ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Cancellation - Recurring Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"ACV Downgrade/Partial ACV Cancellation") ) ), "Cancellation", IF( AND( OR( Maintenance_Amount__c = 0, Maintenance_Amount__c<0 ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Downgrade - CPI"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Downgrade - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - Version License"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Legal - User Count Decrease"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"License Conversion - Recurring Decrease") ) ), "Downgrade", IF( AND( OR( Maintenance_Amount__c = 0, Maintenance_Amount__c<0 ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Unsuccessful Trial - Product Downgrade") ) ), "Unsuccessful Trial", "Unknown" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Churn Class
